mapper.select: select count(food_id) as foodNumber, food_id as foodId from forder where student_id = #{studentId} group by food_id limit #{pageNum}, #{pageSize}

select fo.food_id as foodId, count(fo.food_id) as foodNumber, f.food_name as foodName, f.food_price as foodPrice, s.window_name as windowName, s.window_address as windowAddress, s.principal_telephone as principalTelephone from food f inner join seller s on s.seller_id = f.seller_id inner join forder fo on fo.food_id = f.food_id where f.food_id in ( select food_id from forder where student_id = #{studentId} group by food_id ) group by f.food_id limit #{pageNum}, #{pageSize}
select count(distinct food_id) from forder where student_id = #{studentId}
